idea-plugin.name: Serverless Framework GUI
idea-plugin.description:
Integration of Serverless Framework for all JetBrains IDEs
The idea of the plugin in it's early stage is to ease and automate the tasks of switching between IDE/console while developing serverless applications with Serverless Framework. The plugin adds a tool window at the right hand side of the IDE with label "Serverless Framework GUI". When you open the tool window you will see a list with all serverless.yaml or serverless.yml files found in your project. Under each service you will have every function found in the corresponding serverless.yaml file. Double clicking on a function name will deploy and invoke the selected function and the output of the commands will be displayed on a terminal window.
Requirements
To use this plugin you must have bash shell and Serverless Framework installed.
Notes
serverless executable must be in your search path
